queries: select '${month_partition_bdr}' as periodo, length(CONCAT(lpad(cast(nvl(empresa,0) as string),5,'0'), lpad(cast(nvl(cod_negocio, 0) as string),5,'0'), lpad(nvl(cod_baremo_global,''),5,'0'), lpad(nvl(cod_baremo_local,''),5,'0'), nvl(fecha_desde,'0001-01-01'), nvl(fecha_hasta,'0001-01-01'), nvl(fecha_grabacion,'0001-01-01'), nvl(fecha_modificacion,'0001-01-01'), lpad(cast(nvl(cod_negocio_local,0) as string),5,'0') )) as longitud, CONCAT(lpad(cast(nvl(empresa,0) as string),5,'0'), lpad(cast(nvl(cod_negocio, 0) as string),5,'0'), lpad(nvl(cod_baremo_global,''),5,'0'), lpad(nvl(cod_baremo_local,''),5,'0'), nvl(fecha_desde,'0001-01-01'), nvl(fecha_hasta,'0001-01-01'), nvl(fecha_grabacion,'0001-01-01'), nvl(fecha_modificacion,'0001-01-01'), lpad(cast(nvl(cod_negocio_local,0) as string),5,'0') ) as detalle, from_unixtime(unix_timestamp()) as op_timestamp, d.tabla as tabla from bi_corp_bdr.map_baremos_global_local r left join bi_corp_bdr.tablas_info d on d.tabla = 'JM_REL_BARGL_LO' where and length(CONCAT(lpad(cast(nvl(empresa,0) as string),5,'0'), lpad(cast(nvl(cod_negocio, 0) as string),5,'0'), lpad(nvl(cod_baremo_global,''),5,'0'), lpad(nvl(cod_baremo_local,''),5,'0'), nvl(fecha_desde,'0001-01-01'), nvl(fecha_hasta,'0001-01-01'), nvl(fecha_grabacion,'0001-01-01'), nvl(fecha_modificacion,'0001-01-01'), lpad(cast(nvl(cod_negocio_local,0) as string),5,'0') )) != cast(d.longitud as int)
